about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm Wesley van der Kraan, a passionate developer currently pursuing my education and gaining practical experience through internships.

about.education.description: Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science with a focus on web development and software engineering.
about.journey.title: Personal Journey
about.journey.description1: My journey in tech began with a curiosity about how websites work. This led me to explore HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, eventually diving into frameworks like Vue.js and now expanding to Next.js.
about.journey.description2: I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications that solve real problems.
